name: FIN_ASST_TRKR_RST_ACCL_HX
description: This table contains a history of edits made to the list of account class restrictions placed on a financial assistance tracker record to limit the scope of tracker's approval.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the financial assistance program tracker record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the accout classes approval is restricted to at the time of this update in the financial assistance tracker record. Together with FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID column in this table, this forms the foreign key to the FIN_ASST_TRKR_UPDATE_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple account classes approval is restricted to with the financial assistance tracker record and the update  from the FIN_ASST_TRKR_UPDATE_HX table.

columns.name: UPDATE_ADT_PAT_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The account class category ID of one of the account classes the financial assistance tracker record's approval is restricted to.
